name: A taste of summer in an excluded and unknown place in the Philippines.
description: We all heard about Palawan, Boracay and Cebu island hopping. But have you heard of Burias Group of Island? Experience the the best of Philippines by exploring with us the best and most pristine beaches and islands in the country. Let's island hop starting from Dapa Island and discover its different rock formation. Followed by taking a plunge in Sombrero Island with its beautiful beach. An experience with the crunchiest and tasty sea foods cook by our very own local. Of course, let's not forget to bring our camera's to take selfie with the rock and mountainous formation of Animasola Island. An incredible swim in Tinalisayan sand bar. Lastly, pronouncing its tongue-twisting name is a struggle the same as going to this remote island, Alibijaban Island. An experience you will never forget with whom you can share with your love ones. Book on us now!
